entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 0.12.0.knots20160226 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots version 0.12.0.knots20160226.rc1 binaries are now available for download on their website. For those interested in the source code, it can be found on GitHub under the signed tag. This release brings new features, bug fixes, and other improvements. Preliminary release notes can also be found on their GitHub page. This is a release candidate, which means it's a test version for releases and will be tagged as final if no critical problems arise. If any bugs are found, users are encouraged to report them using the issue tracker at GitHub. Additional Gitian signatures are welcome and can be submitted through pull requests on their GitHub page.
